annotations: "Nguyen Duc Manh Full Stack Developer - AVNON Hanoi, Viet Nam - nguyenducmanh0501@gmail.com - 0963214567 - linkedin.com/in/nguyen-duc-manh - github.com/nguyenducmanh I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in both frontend and backend development.
